Class DataMineConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.representation.util.DataMineConstants

extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds some general constants and utility methods.

        public static boolean isAcceptableDouble(double val)

        Parameters:
        val - Double value.
        Returns:
        True if not a max value, NaN or infinity.

      • isAcceptableInt

        public static boolean isAcceptableInt(int val)
        Checks if a number is acceptable, in a sense that it is not one of the special limit values.
        Parameters:
        val - Integer value.
        Returns:
        True if not a Integer.MAX_VALUE or Integer.MIN_VALUE.
